Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassRoom, HostelRoom

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simulates a generic room. Assume that each room is a cuboid

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int breadth
      Breadth of the room
      private int height
      Height of the room

      Length of the room

    • Method Detail

      • getVolume

        public int getVolume​()
        Calculate the volume of the room
        Returns:
        An integer equal to the volume of the room

      • getSurfaceArea

        public int getSurfaceArea​()
        Calculate the surface area of the room (walls, ceiling and floor)
        Returns:
        An integer equal to the surface area of the room

      • calculateMaintenanceCost

        public int calculateMaintenanceCost​()
        Calculates the base maintenance cost of a generic room. The base maintenance cost of a room is independent of the type of room, i.e. the base maintenance cost is calculated in the same way for all rooms and applies to all rooms Base maintenance cost is 5 * (volume of room) + 2 * (surface area of room)
        Returns:
        [description]
